name: Stablz
description: Stablz is a stablecoin yield aggregator that converts yield to the same type as deposits. Deposit USDT, earn your yield in USDT in a truly set and forget manner. Token utility includes governance, usdt staking rewards, buybacks, and powering the referral program. In the future we will add non-stable asset pools such as ETH, or high APY farms and secure the yield in stablecoins.
